name: Everybody Spikes!
description:
Everybody spikes.  A game where every body spikes. A TigerJ twitch community game jam game.

Keyboard Controls:

[ W ][ A ][ S ][ D ]/arrows: movement ([ Z ][ Q ][ S ][ D ] supported) - Coming Soon (1.0)
[ SPACE ]: jump
[ < ][ > ]: cycle your title prefix  - Coming Soon (1.0)

Controller Support (xbox layout)

[ D-pad ] - you guessed it, coming soon (1.0)
[ Left stick ]: movement|
[A]: jump
[ L ][ R ]: cycle your title prefix

Because the levels are randomly generated during runtime player deaths often will not line up with actual spikes in your seed.  This is intentional.

Why is this a game?

In mid February I ended up streaming a lot of jam games where players were using spikes. I said "everybody spikes" and this idea came to mind. I hope you enjoy.

Our community on twitch is participating in building this game together. Thank you for playing!
